remarks: Construct a Diophantine set from a polynomial with witness variables drawn from any set whatsoever, via ~ mzpcompact2 .  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Oct-2014.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Jun-2015.)
statement:
eldioph2 $p |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ ( S e. _V /\ ( 1 ... N ) C_ S ) /\ P e. ( mzPoly ` S ) ) -> { t | E. u e. ( NN0 ^m S ) ( t = ( u |` ( 1 ... N ) ) /\ ( P ` u ) = 0 ) } e. ( Dioph ` N ) ) $.
$d N t u $.
$d P t u $.
$d S t u $.
